content:
Check:
  all:
    - any:
        - name: --DOSE
          operator: non_empty
        - name: --DOSTOT
          operator: non_empty
        - name: --DOSTXT
          operator: non_empty
    - name: --DOSU
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: ABC
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when --DOSU = null and (--DOSE ^= null or --DOSTOT
  ^= null or --DOSTXT ^= null)
Outcome:
  Message: Missing value for --DOSU, when --DOSE, --DOSTXT or --DOSTOT is provided
  Output Variables:
    - --DOSE
    - --DOSTXT
    - --DOSU
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0114
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Units for --DOSE, --DOSTOT, or --DOSTXT
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --DOSU
                Section: Interventions
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - INTERVENTIONS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when --DOSU = null and (--DOSE ^= null or --DOSTOT ^= null or --DOSTXT ^= null)

Outcome.Message: Missing value for --DOSU, when --DOSE, --DOSTXT or --DOSTOT is provided
